launcher.releaseNotes:
Launcher improvements:

• Enhanced dual version checking system
• Added self-updating capability
• Improved error handling and recovery
• Better progress reporting

This update adds support for updating both launcher and application independently.

application.releaseNotes:
Bug fixes and improvements:

• Fixed login issue with special characters
• Improved performance for large parking lots
• Updated UI for better user experience
• Fixed database connection timeout issues

This update is recommended for all users.
